:mod:`calculator`
=================

.. py:module:: calculator


Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   calculator.Calculator



.. class:: Calculator

   calcualtor class

   .. method:: add(self, a: float, b: float) -> float

      multiply given two number

      :param a:
      :type a: floatp
      :param b:
      :type b: float

      :returns:
      :rtype: float

      Examples::

          from calculator import Calculator

          calculator = Calculator()
          calculator.add(3, 4)


   .. method:: mul(self, a: float, b: float) -> float

      multiply given two number

      :param a:
      :type a: floatp
      :param b:
      :type b: float

      :returns:
      :rtype: float

      Examples::

          from calculator import Calculator

          calculator = Calculator()
          calculator.mul(3, 4)
